ImportLocalPlugin.accessRepoViaProxy: Access code repositories that are inaccessible from mainland China via proxy: e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890
ImportLocalPlugin.enterLocalPluginPath: Please enter the local plugin path
ImportLocalPlugin.enterPluginID: Please enter plugin IDs, separated by 'commas' or 'new lines'...
ImportLocalPlugin.enterNucleiPoCLocalPath: Please enter the Nuclei PoC local path
ImportLocalPlugin.externalResourceWarning: Importing external resources has potential risks and may introduce malicious code or payloads, leading to data leaks, system compromises, and other serious consequences. Please carefully consider the necessity of importing external resources and ensure the source is trustworthy and the content is safe. If you must use external resources, it is recommended to prioritize official, secure versions or write your own controllable data sources. Additionally, please keep your system and software up to date, promptly fix known vulnerabilities, and maintain daily security protection.

MITMRule.http_header_cookie_priority_tip: HTTP Header and HTTP Cookie have a higher priority and will overwrite the body content
MITMRule.enable_substitute_then_discard_tip: After enabling substitution, you can discard the current request/response
MITMRule.option_no_replace_request_tip: This option only applies to requests. When enabled, the (request) packet will not be replaced, and the substituted result will be sent as an extra packet
MITMRule.select_request_or_response_header_body_t: After selecting request or response, at least one of Header and Body must be selected
MITMRule.replace_rule_effect_warning: A replacement rule has been detected. This may affect interception. Are you sure you want to enable it?
MITMRule.drag_disabled_tip: Dragging is disabled. You can only drag rules within the same status
MITMRule.save_rule_and_close_prompt: Do you want to save the rule content and close the pop-up window?

MITMRuleImport.copy_json_into_box_tip: You can copy JSON code into the box below

MITMRuleFromModal.group_matching_tip: Enter 0 to match all; enter a number to match the entered group; leave blank to match the first group by default
MITMRuleFromModal.http_header_cookie_priority_tip: HTTP Header and HTTP Cookie have a higher priority and will overwrite the body content
MITMRuleFromModal.enter_content_to_replace_tip: Enter the content you want to replace, can be empty~
MITMRuleFromModal.url_specific_rule_tip: The rule will only be effective for this URL; regular expressions are supported

RuleContent.use_right_tool_generate_regex: You can use the tool on the right to automatically generate a regex
RuleContent.select_in_editor_generate_regex: Select content in the editor to automatically generate a regex

ProxyConfig.title: Proxy Rules Configuration
ProxyConfig.tip: Customize Proxy Rule Groups According To Your Needs
ProxyConfig.disable_add_new_route: Please configure at least one proxy node.
ProxyConfig.confirm_delete_all: Are You Sure You Want To Delete? This Cannot Be Undone
ProxyConfig.valid_proxy_address_tip: Please Enter Valid Proxy Address (E.g.: http://127.0.0.1:8080)
ProxyConfig.proxy_address_placeholder: Please select or enter a proxy address. If the proxy requires a password, the format is: http://user:pass@ip:port
ProxyConfig.migration_title: Whether to migrate the downstream agent configuration data to the new version; if not, it is considered that the historical data should be abandoned.
ProxyConfig.address_tip: After configuration, only the target address uses the proxy, and all other traffic does not use the proxy.
ProxyConfig.delete_point_tips: This Points is still referenced by {i} rules; deleting it will remove it from those rules as well. Continue?
ProxyConfig.detectionLoading: Testing in progress, please wait patiently...
ProxyConfig.disable_point_tips: This Points is still referenced by {i} rules; Disable it will remove it from those rules as well. Continue?
ProxyConfig.select_disabled_tip: The selected proxy has been disabled. We recommend using a different, available proxy.
